author: ersiner
msg: Adding and modifying svn check out and eclipse project building scripts.

author: taylor
msg: remove object pooling from servlet invoker implementations
1. with more than 100 connections, it would effectively bottleneck the portal
2. commons pooling was not releasing itself on redeploy
i discovered this while doing some initial tests under WAS
but ive been informed that it also occurs on tomcat

author: dain
msg: Moved SMTP javamail transport out of sandbox and into modules/javamail-transport

author: baranda
msg: Fixes exception when using converters in UISelectMany components. Now it is possible to pass an array of values of any type to the selectMany value attribute. Fixes MYFACES-154,669 and 852
